structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY EMPLOYEES' CIVIL SERVICE AND RETIREMENT

law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 36, effective March 26, 1974. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 65. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 4. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 5. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 3.
